price: Ibuka (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo umugore wa Imurani yavugaga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri nshyizeho umugambi wo kukwegurira uwo ntwite (ngo azabe umukozi w’ingoro yawe y’i Yeruzalemu), bityo binyakirire. Mu by’ukuri, ni Wowe Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ عِمۡرَٰنَ رَبِّ إِنِّي نَذَرۡتُ لَكَ مَا فِي بَطۡنِي مُحَرَّرٗا فَتَقَبَّلۡ مِنِّيٓۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qālati im'ra-atu ʿim'rāna rabbi innī nadhartu laka mā fī baṭnī muḥarraran fataqabbal minnī innaka anta al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
